exceptions.exn: In environment a : ad a0 : prec_list a1 : ad p : prec_list c : ad r0 : prec_list Unable to unify "prec_list" with "MapGet prec_list (s_produit_r a1 p (M1 prec_list a a0)) c = Some r0".

chat.content:
Help me to prove a theorem in Coq, based on provided proof states including hypotheses and goals. Give a complete proof in only one single code block without explanations, extra definitions. Give a complete proof in one response, only give the proof body, without repeating the definition and "Proof.". Avoid existing names when using intros. Write the commands separately, without ";" and "[cmd|cmd]". Use bullets for structure, NEVER use "{" and "}". When -, + and * are used out, proceed to double versions like --, ++, etc. For example, given proof state:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m
============================
m + S n = S n + m
The hypotheses n, m: nat and IHn: m + n = n + m are given first, then the goal, m + S n = S n + m, separated by =. Expect a response like: 
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.``` 
You do not intros any terms because all terms have already been introduced.

When I give:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m
============================
n, m: nat
your answer should be like:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```
Definitions and lemmas related to the proof will be provided, use them accordingly.

forall (a : ad) (a0 : prec_list), sproductr_1_def (M1 prec_list a a0)

ad = N : Set

sproductr_0_1 : forall (a : ad) (a0 : prec_list), sproductr_0_def (M1 prec_list a a0)

pl_compatible_cons_r : forall (p : prec_list) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_compatible p (prec_cons a la ls) -> exists (a0 : ad) (la0 ls0 : prec_list), p = prec_cons a0 la0 ls0

mpl_compat_0 : forall (c : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list c pl0) (M1 prec_list c pl1) -> pl_compat pl0 pl1
MapPut_semantics_1 : forall (A : Type) (a : ad) (y : A) (a0 : ad), MapGet A (MapPut A (M0 A) a y) a0 = MapGet A (M1 A a y) a0
MapPut_semantics_2_1 : forall (A : Type) (a : ad) (y y' : A) (a0 : ad), MapGet A (MapPut A (M1 A a y) a y') a0 = (if (a =? a0)%N then Some y' else None)
mpl_compat_4 : forall (s0 s1 : state) (pl : prec_list), mpl_compat (M2 prec_list s0 s1) (M1 prec_list 1%N pl) -> mpl_compat s1 (M1 prec_list 0%N pl)

MapDelta_semantics_3_1 : forall (A : Type) (a0 : ad) (y0 : A) (m' : Map A) (a : ad) (y y' : A), MapGet A (M1 A a0 y0) a = Some y -> MapGet A m' a = Some y' -> MapGet A (MapDelta A (M1 A a0 y0) m') a = None

MapDelta_semantics_2_1 : forall (A : Type) (a : ad) (y : A) (m' : Map A) (a0 : ad) (y0 : A), MapGet A (M1 A a y) a0 = None -> MapGet A m' a0 = Some y0 -> MapGet A (MapDelta A (M1 A a y) m') a0 = Some y0

sproductr_0 : forall (s : state) (a : ad) (p : prec_list) (c : ad) (r0 r1 : prec_list), MapGet prec_list (M1 prec_list a p) c = Some r0 -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some r1 -> MapGet prec_list (s_produit_r a p s) c = Some (pl_produit r1 r0)
Inductive prec_occur : prec_list -> ad -> Prop := prec_hd : forall (a : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) a | prec_int0 : forall (a b : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur pl0 b -> prec_occur (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) b | prec_int1 : forall (a b : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur pl1 b -> prec_occur (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) b

Map_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Prop), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (a0 : A), P (M1 A a a0)) -> (forall m : Map A, P m -> forall m0 : Map A, P m0 -> P (M2 A m m0)) -> forall m : Map A, P m
Map_rec : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Set), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (a0 : A), P (M1 A a a0)) -> (forall m : Map A, P m -> forall m0 : Map A, P m0 -> P (M2 A m m0)) -> forall m : Map A, P m
sproductl_1_def = fun s : state => forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list) (c : ad) (r : prec_list), MapGet prec_list (s_produit_l a p s) c = Some r -> exists r0 r1 : prec_list, MapGet prec_list (M1 prec_list a p) c = Some r0 /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some r1 : state -> Prop
sproductr_0_def = fun s : state => forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list) (c : ad) (r0 r1 : prec_list), MapGet prec_list (M1 prec_list a p) c = Some r0 -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some r1 -> MapGet prec_list (s_produit_r a p s) c = Some (pl_produit r1 r0) : state -> Prop
sproductl_0_def = fun s : state => forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list) (c : ad) (r0 r1 : prec_list), MapGet prec_list (M1 prec_list a p) c = Some r0 -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some r1 -> MapGet prec_list (s_produit_l a p s) c = Some (pl_produit r0 r1) : state -> Prop
MapPut_semantics_2 : forall (A : Type) (a a' : ad) (y y' : A) (a0 : ad), MapGet A (MapPut A (M1 A a y) a' y') a0 = (if (a' =? a0)%N then Some y' else if (a =? a0)%N then Some y else None)
prec_list_rec : forall P : prec_list -> Set, (forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), P p -> forall p0 : prec_list, P p0 -> P (prec_cons a p p0)) -> P prec_empty -> forall p : prec_list, P p
prec_list_ind : forall P : prec_list -> Prop, (forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), P p -> forall p0 : prec_list, P p0 -> P (prec_cons a p p0)) -> P prec_empty -> forall p : prec_list, P p
